# A Backlog of Enhancement Ideas for the plugin

* Integration with the VASTFMT plugin
* Display track names from internet streams if available
* Make sure API docs cover url streaming
* Move "Main Show Playlist" config option into its own config setting section
* Create auto generated PSA from text input
* RDS Output of playing info
* Option to mix mp3 audio playlist tracks to stop any quiet spots at end of tracks transisitioning to next track
* Add a music Icon into the FPP header when background music plugin is active
